#summary eBattles installation.

= Requirements =
 * e107 CMS v0.7+

= Step-by-step installation =
 # Upload the plugin 
  # Unzip the plugin
  # Upload ebattles/ folder in e107_plugins/
  # Make sure ebattles/cache/ folder is writable (CHMOD 755 or 777)
 # Install the plugin
  # In e107, Admin Area>Plugin Manager, click on the eBattles "Install" button 
 # Add plugin menus 
  # In Admin Area>Menus, you can choose an area for eBattles menus
   * ebattles: menu with links to Events, Teams, User Profile pages
   * eb_activity: menu with list of latest gaming activity
 # Configure the plugin
  # In Admin Area>Plugins/eBattles, you can change the plugin settings
   * Moderator userclass: determines which userclass has admin privileges on ebattles
   * Events delayed updates: If enabled, events stats will be recalculated only if the event has changed and the delay has expired
   * Insert debug data in database: for debugging purpose only
